lines.text: All ya gotta do is ask, Slim.

[quoting a poem]
"I was angry with my friend. I told my wrath, my wrath did end. I was angry with my foe. I told my wrath, my wrath did grow."
You couldn't possibly have anything I want! These animals are made of the highest quality.
What a coincidence. So am I
Hope you're enjoying your leisure time, kid. Cause its time to take that thumb outta your ass!
How about Nexus 6. Do you know a lot about them?
I think you should leave now.
